explanation: The stage direction describes the setting of the scene, including the location and specific details like the presence of a small screen on the left. This falls under the 'setting' category as it pertains to the description of the stage or play location.
stgdir: La scène représente le boudoir de la Comtesse. À gauche, un petit paravent. Au lever du rideau, la Comtesse de La Roche-Gaston est seule en scène.
